name: studio-management-system
description: Hệ thống quản lý studio cho thuê

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../desktop && npm install
scripts.clean:
rmdir /s /q node_modules backend
ode_modules frontend
ode_modules desktop
ode_modules 2>nul || echo Clean completed
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
